question:
[Mickey] and his brother [Leandro] went to the park to play basketball. [Chuck] was so excited to surprise his son, [Leandro], with the tickets to the playoffs. [Donald] and his sister [Sara] have been best friends ever since childhood. [Donald] and his son [Chuck] went to look at cars. [Donald] ended up buying the Mustang. [Sara] and her aunt, [Martha], went to the deli. They got a half a pound of corned beef, and two pounds of salami. [Elizabeth] and her son [Leandro] made hot dogs. [Leandro]'s brother [Mickey] ate one.
Question: How is [Martha] related to [Elizabeth]?

Step 3: Determine the relationship between Martha and Elizabeth:
- Martha is Sara's aunt

- Leandro's mother is Elizabeth

Based on the information provided, Martha is related to Elizabeth as Leandro's great-aunt.
